statusLine.command: INPUT=$(cat); TIME=$(date +"%H:%M:%S"); DIR=$(basename "$(pwd)" | cut -c1-25); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null | cut -c1-12); MODEL=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"' | sed 's/.*Sonnet.*/Sonnet/' | sed 's/.*Opus.*/Opus/' | sed 's/.*Haiku.*/Haiku/' | sed 's/.*/Claude/'); BRANCH_DISPLAY=""; [ -n "$BRANCH" ] && BRANCH_DISPLAY=" [\\033[32m$BRANCH\\033[0m]"; printf 'üïê \033[36m%s\033[0m | üìÅ \033[34m%s\033[0m%s | ü§ñ \033[33m%s\033[0m' "$TIME" "$DIR" "$BRANCH_DISPLAY" "$MODEL"
